constituent: purple, Prince, this here, stop, footprint, spoon, sitting on the ground, thread, spiderman
koohiiStory1: Stop sitting for so long - or else you'll get those purple threads (veins) on your legs from bad circulation. [link purple with those huge purple, bulging, crawling, worm-like varicose veins .....].
koohiiStory2: Why is your ass purple? Well, I stopped and sat for a bit on a pile of thread... (I guess it was freshly dyed).
